titles.title: Recognizing Filipino American Heritage Month and celebrating the heritage and culture of Filipino Americans and their immense contributions to the Nation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2210-2211)
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
10/2/2008--Introduced.
Recognizes the celebration of Filipino American Heritage Month and honors the heritage and culture of Filipino Americans and their immense contributions to the life of the nation.
